official_title: To amend the Community Services Block Grant Act with respect to the composition of the boards of community action agencies, and of nonprofit private organizations, that receive funds under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Community Services Block Grant Act to make certain community action agency and nonprofit private organization board composition requirements discretionary.

titles.title: To amend the Community Services Block Grant Act with respect to the composition of the boards of community action agencies, and of nonprofit private organizations, that receive funds under such Act.
